text: Maga tyanni amacyasi jo vayada kela hota, tyapasuna mukarale ani allahacya ayatinca inkara karu lagale, yethaparyanta ki allahacya paigambaranna nahaka thara marale ani asehi mhanu lagale hote ki amaci mane avaranakhali aheta, (ase nahi) kimbahuna allahane tyancya inkara karanyapayi tyancya hrdayanna moharabanda kele ahe. Tevha tyancyapaiki phara thodeca loka imana rakhatata
